description:
The Spider-Man film franchise has been moving forward simultaneously at both Sony Pictures and Marvel Studios. Now the latest installment in the MCU‘s series, Spider-Man 4, has just received an official title. Sony Pictures revealed the title at the end of their CinemaCon showcase. Fans have paid attention to the event with an eagerness to [...]

The post Tom Holland’s ‘Spider-Man 4’ Gets Official Title appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Tom Holland’s ‘Spider-Man 4’ Gets Official Title

description:
Rachel Zegler and Gal Gadot, the co-stars of Disney’s live-action Snow White remake, are potentially being considered for a different kind of Disney venture. Specifically, a new rumor has surfaced that suggests both Rachel Zegler and Gal Gadot are on the studio’s list for major Marvel roles in the MCU. The MCU, otherwise known as [...]

The post Rachel Zegler And Gal Gadot Rumored For Marvel MCU Roles appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Rachel Zegler And Gal Gadot Rumored For Marvel MCU Roles
